Title: Phineas and Ferb the Movie: Across the 2nd Dimension
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Musical, Sci-Fi
Director: Robert Hughes, Dan Povenmire, Jay Lender, Jeff 'Swampy' Marsh, Kyle Menke
Writer: Jon Colton Barry, Dan Povenmire, Jeff 'Swampy' Marsh, Michael Diederich (additional material), Wendy Grieb (additional material), Chris Headrick (additional material), Kyle Menke (additional material), Tom Minton (additional material), Zac Moncrief (additional material), Sue Perrotto (additional material), Bernie Petterson (additional material), Joe Orrantia (additional material), Aliki Theofilopoulos (additional material), Chong Lee (additional material), Kaz (additional material), Antoine Guilbaud (additional material), Kim Roberson (additional material), Seth Kersley (additional material)
Actors: Vincent Martella, Ashley Tisdale, Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Caroline Rhea
Plot: Phineas and Ferb discover that Perry is a secret agent, and they all get stuck in an alternate dimension where Doofenschmirtz is the ruler of the tri-state area.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.
